body_html:
Want just mention that the master-branch 0464602 is broken again, while the tensorflow-gpu package works fine.

Is this feedback you want to see in the issues, or should I wait if the issue goes into the next relase?

  • missing #include<cassert> in /tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/util/cuda_device_functions.h(196): error: identifier "assert" is undefined
  • stack-trace: /tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/tensor.h:692] Check failed: IsAligned()

body:
Want just mention that the master-branch 0464602ee99ff2a10336f2bea12440167e2d8a70 is broken again, while the tensorflow-gpu package works fine.

Is this feedback you want to see in the issues, or should I wait if the issue goes into the next relase?
- missing `#include<cassert>` in ` /tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/util/cuda_device_functions.h(196): error: identifier "assert" is undefined`
- stack-trace: `/tensorflow/include/tensorflow/core/framework/tensor.h:692] Check failed: IsAligned()`
